::Grimmler::

Grimmler nods, watching Angel Prime take Amperion to a CR. He looks 
back to SlashStrike. "Allright. As long as you don't try to mess 
things up you should be fine. Follow me."

He turns and enters the CF.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Waspinator9063@a... wrote:
> SlashStrike thinks this statement over. "I WAS a maximal. Currently 
I am of 
> NO faction, but I have done nothing to support or betray either 
side." He 
> wonders if she should be so honest. To show that he means no harm, 
he sheaths 
> his sword into his back. "I... am here to assist those in the 
right."
